Package com.kyron.rmi

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    DBAccess  
    DBServerInterface
    This interface captures all the business methods required by the client.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ActionPanel  
    BasePanel
    This class implements the generic utility functions which are needed by all the Views (Panels).
    BasePropertiesDialog
    This is a helper class that implements most of the logic to capture the properties to run the server or the client through a GUI.
    Client
    Starts the client side of the application.
    ClientPropertiesDialog  
    Controller
    This class is the controller of the client application.
    DB  
    DB.LockTestThread
    This class is just to test the locking functionality.
    DBServer  
    Model
    This data model is Observable and will be used in a JTable to display data.
    RMI  
    RMIServer
    Since we need to make this a RMI Remote object we have to extend it from UnicastRemoteObject and so we cannot extend it from DBServer.
    Server
    This class provides the startup method for the RMI Server application.
    ServerPropertiesDialog
    This class provides a simple GUI to capture parameters required to run RMI based server.
    TablePanel
    This panel contains a JTable.
    View
    ViewFrame includes: - actionPanel - ActionPanel - BasePanel - dataPanel - to do Do layout the panels Provide a hook to set ActionListener to actionPanel Provide a hook to let an outside model to Observe actionPanel
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    CheckedException
    A generic checked Exception used by this application for reporting any business logic exception.
    DuplicateKeyException  
    RecordNotFoundException  
    SecurityException
